places.name: Houston Museum of Natural Science
places.description: A popular museum featuring exhibits on paleontology, astronomy, chemistry, and more.

places.name: Buffalo Bayou Park
places.description: A scenic park offering hiking, biking trails, gardens, and views of the Houston skyline.

places.name: Space Center Houston
places.description: NASA's official visitor center offering exhibits on space exploration and science.

places.name: The Galleria
places.description: Texas' largest shopping center featuring luxury stores, an ice rink, and restaurants.

places.name: Houston Zoo
places.description: A large zoo housing over 6,000 animals with engaging exhibits and educational programs.

places.name: Discovery Green
places.description: A vibrant urban park in downtown Houston with art installations, events, and playgrounds.

places.name: Museum of Fine Arts, Houston
places.description: One of the largest art museums in the country, featuring diverse collections from around the world.

places.name: Gerald D. Hines Waterwall Park
places.description: A dramatic multi-story water fountain and green space perfect for photos and relaxation.
